dict.acceptation: 企（事）业单位；事业，计划；事业心，进取心；

sent.orig: Electronic Commerce and ERP (enterprise resources planning) are integrated to one system. This system is e-ERP.
sent.trans: e-ERP(Electronic Commerce—Enterprise Resource Planning)是电子商务(Electronic Commerce)和企业资源计划(ERP)整合后的产物。

sent.orig: Our economy is made up of three sectors, state enterprise, co-operative enterprise and private enterprise.
sent.trans: 现在我们的国民经济，是由国营事业、合作社事业和私人事业这三方面组成的。

sent.orig: In word, information building of enterprise reflects competition capacity of enterprise.
sent.trans: 可以说企业的信息化从一个侧面反映了企业的竞争能力。

sent.orig: Private enterprise should be encouraged and state enterprise regarded as only one sector of the economy.
sent.trans: 应该奖励民营企业，而把政府经营的国营企业只当作整个企业的一部分。

sent.orig: The venture business enterprise can use the venture business enterprise value evaluates signguide its management active.
sent.trans: 对于风险企业而言，借助于评价体系自察，可以对自身管理上的弱点有一个较明确的认识。
